title: Crédit Agricole Italia
description: Crédit Agricole Italia Banking Group serves 73% of the population and 80% of GDP in 11 key Italian regions. With a customer-centric approach, the Group is a retail bank dedicated to all market segments. As a React Native developer, I contributed to the creation of iOS and Android apps for the Group.

body.raw:
###### Screenshot Android

[![](/images/CA-Android.png)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=it.caitalia.apphub&pcampaignid=web_share)

###### Screenshot iPhone

[![](/images/CA-iPhone.png)](https://apps.apple.com/it/app/cr%C3%A9dit-agricole-italia/id1502700297)

I designed and implemented UI pages based on Figma designs, seamlessly integrating Mocked Web Services into the application. Additionally, I created DTO classes and Redux functions, addressing and resolving bugs in alignment with project requirements.

title: Cropwise by Syngenta
description: A single platform with integrated services and solutions that talk to each other, so that farmers and advisors can understand how to optimize their farm and their day.

body.raw:
[![](/images/cropwise-op.png)](https://www.cropwise.com/operations) 

Collaborated with the team, spearheading the UI development in React Native TypeScript. Engineered cost-effective MapBox integration as an alternative to Google Maps, showcasing Proof of Concepts. Boosted productivity by creating and reusing custom components.

###### Screenshot Android

 [![](/images/cropwise-android.png)](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.nst.cropio&pcampaignid=web_share)

###### Screenshot iPhone

[![](/images/cropwise-iphone.png)](https://apps.apple.com/ua/app/cropwise-operations/id919636306?l=en&platform=iphone)

title: ICE Robotics
description: Undertook a precious co-op position as an IT Robotics and Application Design Assistant at ICE Robotics Canada.

body.raw:
[![](/images/iceducation-homescreen.png)](https://www.iceducation.ca/)

Demonstrated strong skills in website maintenance, explicitly managing multiple websites and implementing gateway payment solutions using WordPress, HTML, and JS.
Mentored and instructed students on various technology concepts, fostering their understanding of HTML, CSS, and robotics.
